themes: lack of diverse representation in music industry leadership
ownership and power dynamics in cultural spaces
barriers for underrepresented communities in business ownership
need for business knowledge and mentorship for sustainability
key_phrases: get more diverse identities into positions of power in the music industry
vast majority of venues, studios, labels, and businesses are owned by men by a landslide
people get stuck from top-down pressures
helping underrepresented communities create and/or run venues, music studios, creative or cultural spaces
providing resources especially in business knowledge
securing mentorship with more established businesses/orgs
barriers_identified: lack of diverse ownership and leadership in music industry
insufficient business knowledge and resources for underrepresented communities
solutions_proposed: helping underrepresented communities create and/or run venues, music studios, creative or cultural spaces, and other music-related businesses or organizations
providing resources especially in business knowledge to underrepresented communities
securing mentorship with more established businesses/orgs
